title: weres my lvl 5 honor gone why is it back at 2
body: i havent had a ban or nothing i was honor 5 now its locked on lvl 2 3 checkpoint ????????????????

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AYe6J4q3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-11-10T03:51:33.714+0000)
>
> submit support ticket

they take far to long to answer

> [{quoted}](name=Shao Sin,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AYe6J4q3,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-11-10T04:10:09.909+0000)
>
> they take far to long to answer

The longer you wait before contacting support, the longer you'll have to wait for an answer.  If it takes a day to respond to you, waiting 3 days to submit a ticket means you won't get a response until 4 days from now.

I've submitted multiple tickets over the past few years, and have always gotten a response within a day.
When did u last log in?
Well that's the honor reset point for after the season ends... However it seems to be a few days early...

> [{quoted}](name=ValyrianBlade,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AYe6J4q3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-10T03:42:54.164+0000)
>
> Well that's the honor reset point for after the season ends... However it seems to be a few days early...

but other people have honor load ins
Is it possible you swapped accounts from an H5 to an H2 one and forgot?  Definitely doesn't sound like a penalty, since those would drop you to 1 or 0.

> [{quoted}](name=Ice Weasel X,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AYe6J4q3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-10T03:46:50.292+0000)
>

no i have
